org.cantaloupe.audio.source

Class WorldSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cantaloupe.world.WorldObject
      • org.cantaloupe.audio.source.WorldSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISource, ITimableSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PositionedSource

    public abstract class WorldSource
extends WorldObject
implements ISource, ITimableSource
    An abstract class containing methods for physical sources.
    Author:
    Dylan Scheltens
